TypeSignature.Value: generic <typename TType, typename TGenericContext> public value class SignatureDecoder
.class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignatureDecoder`2<TType, TGenericContext> extends System.ValueType

remarks.format:
## Remarks
For more information, see the Metadata Specification section II.23.2: Blobs and signatures.

MemberSignature.Value: public TType DecodeType (ref System.Reflection.Metadata.BlobReader blobReader, bool allowTypeSpecifications = false);
.method public hidebysig instance !TType DecodeType(valuetype System.Reflection.Metadata.BlobReader& blobReader, bool allowTypeSpecifications) cil managed
Public Function DecodeType (ByRef blobReader As BlobReader, Optional allowTypeSpecifications As Boolean = false) As TType
member this.DecodeType : BlobReader * bool -> 'ype

Docs.param: The blob reader positioned at the leading .
to allow a to follow a (CLASS | VALUETYPE) in the signature; otherwise.
Docs.summary: Decodes a type embedded in a signature and advances the reader past the type.

remarks.format: At present, the only context where `allowTypeSpecifications` might be `true` is in a LocalConstantSig as defined by the Portable PDB specification.

Docs.exception: The reader was not positioned at a valid signature type.
